item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: February 27, 2025 Today's Verse Matthew 5:5 [5] â€œBlessed are the meek, for they shall inherit the earth. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable. 2 Corinthians 5:17 - Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation.
